attributes.action: To create an Air Ambulance Service for each county (for those who do not already have one) and for them (that don't already) to recieve government funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The air ambulance service is vital for getting injured people to the hospitol for emergency treatment quiclky. This is much faster then taking the roads to the scene of the incident.
